mapper.select: select m.*, sc.code channelCode, sc.name channelName, sc.status channelStatus, sc.machine_id, sc.parent_code, sc.volume_count, sc.goods_count, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, if(aa.circle='其他' or aa.circle is null,'',aa.circle),IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'') ) AS localeStr, scg.goods_id goodsId from inno72_machine m left join view_machine_goods mg on m.id=mg.machine_id inner join inno72_check_user_machine cum on m.id=cum.machine_id inner join inno72_supply_channel sc on cum.machine_id = sc.machine_id and sc.status=0 and sc.is_delete=0 inner JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id inner JOIN inno72_admin_area aa ON aa.CODE = l.area_code left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id and mg.goods_id=scg.goods_id where m.machine_status=4 and cum.check_user_id=#{checkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.*, sc.code channelCode, sc.name channelName, sc.status channelStatus, sc.machine_id, sc.parent_code, sc.volume_count, sc.goods_count, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, if(aa.circle='其他' or aa.circle is null,'',aa.circle),IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'') ) AS localeStr from inno72_machine m inner join view_machine_goods mg on mg.machine_id=m.id inner join inno72_check_user_machine cum on m.id=cum.machine_id inner join inno72_check_user cu on cum.check_user_id=cu.id inner join inno72_supply_channel sc on sc.machine_id=m.id and sc.status=0 and sc.is_delete=0 inner join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on scg.supply_channel_id=sc.id inner join inno72_locale l on m.locale_id=l.id inner join inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code where m.machine_status=4 and cu.id=#{checkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and scg.goods_id=#{goodsId}

select m.*, scg.goods_id goodsId, cf.code faultCode, cf.id faultId, cf.status faultStatus, cf.type faultType, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, if(aa.circle='其他' or aa.circle is null,'',aa.circle),IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'') ) AS localeStr, csi.id signInId, csi.create_time cTime, sc.code channelCode, sc.name channelName, sc.status channelStatus, sc.machine_id, sc.parent_code, sc.volume_count, sc.goods_count, (select count(*) from inno72_alarm_msg am where machine_code=m.machine_code and am.is_read=0) noReadCount from inno72_machine m inner join inno72_check_user_machine cum on cum.machine_id=m.id inner join inno72_locale l on m.locale_id=l.id inner join inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code left join inno72_check_fault cf on m.id=cf.machine_id and cf.status in (1,2) left join inno72_check_sign_in csi on m.id=csi.machine_id and date_format(csi.create_time,'%Y%M%D') = date_format(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y%M%D') and csi.check_user_id=#{checkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join view_machine_goods mg on mg.machine_id=m.id left join inno72_supply_channel sc on m.id = sc.machine_id and sc.status=0 and sc.is_delete=0 left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id and scg.goods_id=mg.goods_id where (m.machine_status=4 or m.machine_status=9) and cum.check_user_id=#{checkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.*, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, if(aa.circle='其他' or aa.circle is null,'',aa.circle),IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'') ) AS localeStr from inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa ON aa.CODE = l.area_code where m.machine_code=#{machineCode} limit 1

select m.*, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, if(aa.circle='其他' or aa.circle is null,'',aa.circle),IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'') ) AS localeStr from inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa ON aa.CODE = l.area_code where m.id=#{machineId} limit 1
